settings.title: Campaign Featured Product
settings.subtitle: We've squeezed every drop of our coffee crafting expertise into our compostable capsules for Nespresso® machines. Delivering monthly to your door.
settings.shipping_info: Free UK shipping when spend £25 or more, or when you subscribe to refills.
settings.free_tin_info: Free Grind tins with every subscription
settings.product_details: The standard, original & still the best, official Grind House Blend in a pod.
settings.product_disclaimer: Subsequent months are charged at £13.50 (10% off original price)

settings.title: Campaign Image + Text
settings.text: You can change the image, image width, background colour, all text, text-alignment, and reverse the layout.

settings.title: Campaign Masthead Hero
settings.text: Change the background colour, all text, and add a top or bottom margin.

settings.subtitle_1: You can change the background colour.

settings.title: Product Advert
settings.content_body: You can edit all text, the background colour, icons, the image, and links.
settings.selling_point_content_1: With 19 bars of pressure, it's designed to make the most of our compostable coffee pods for Nespresso® machines.
settings.selling_point_content_2: it's built to last - an antidote to the mass-market plastic machines that seem destined for landfill.
settings.selling_point_content_3: With 19 bars of pressure, it's designed to make the most of our compostable coffee pods for Nespresso® machines.
